title: Introducing: CAPESIDE
body:
Florida duo **CAPESIDE** have one of the most ambitious sounds of the year.

Comprised of Kevin James Neal (JUDE.) and Aaron William Reyes (Wonderama), their two debut tracks, _Please Be Cool_ and _In The City_ feature the same sort of immaculate, searingly over the top production found on [Crystals](www.crackintheroad.com/music/27897-new-jude-crystals), Neal’s outing earlier this year which brought his music to the attention of numerous blogs. Their sound is bold, perhaps startlingly so at times, yet a truly refreshing, very modern take on slightly off-kilter pop music.
